${ModID}:Absorb.NAME: Absorb
${ModID}:Absorb.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Bloodcast !M!. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! [soulbindermod:TempHPIcon] NL ${ModID}:Coalesce ${ModID}:Fangs

${ModID}:Ponder.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Draw a card ALL enemies gain [soulbindermod:RimeIcon] equal to thrice it's cost.

${ModID}:SoulTap.NAME: Soul Tap

${ModID}:Necroblast.NAME: Necroblast
${ModID}:Necroblast.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Exile !M! card from your exhaust pile, Deal damage and Gain [soulbindermod:BlockIcon] equal to twice its damage or [soulbindermod:BlockIcon] (whichever is larger).
${ModID}:Necroblast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Reclaim !M!, Deal damage and Gain [soulbindermod:BlockIcon] equal to twice its damage or [soulbindermod:BlockIcon] (whichever is larger).

I need an exhausted card that #rdeals #rdamage or #rgains #rBlock for this card .

${ModID}:RemorselessWinter.DESCRIPTION: [soulbindermod:FrostIcon] damage is increased by the targets [soulbindermod:RimeIcon]
